page.title: 12The Boat Trip (continued).
page.content: When we had gone a bit further we slowed down to go into Jenny's Cove. When we had stopped we saw two Puffins, one was in the water,one was flying.We saw lots more different birds as well.We stayed there for ten minutes.When we had gone a bit further we saw Battery Point and the Old Light.When we went past the South lighthouse George sounded the fog horn.We all waved to him.When we were back where we started from,the little blue boat picked us up.We saw Mr.Hanks on Rat Island and it looked like they were stuck.Later we saw them come out of a cave that went through the island.While they were doing that we were climbing some rocks and looking in some rock pools. We saw a strawberry. It was not real,it was a Sea Anemone. {Lucy Martin.
